text: Gary Lee Weiss (born December 27, 1955 in Brenham, Texas) is a former shortstop in Major League Baseball. He played in 22 games for the Los Angeles Dodgers during the 1980 and 1981 seasons. ==Other websites== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Major League Baseball shortstops Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Gary Weiss (baseball)
